49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Isa bin Mariam, peace be upon him, saw a man stealing, and said to him: Are you stealing? He said: No, by Allah besides Whom there is no other God! 'Isa, peace be upon him, said: I believe in Allah and I disbelieve my eyes

chapter.eng-name: How the Judge is to Ask People to Swear for an Oath
